violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.
Ensure all persons have required badges.

violations.description: Unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages nearby.
Persons are fighting, running, or exhibiting aggressive gestures.
violations.recommendation: Stop the behavior and address it with management.

violations.description: Not all persons in work zones are wearing required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons wear required PPE.

report.summary: The scene observation is non-compliant with several security rules. Please address the issues to ensure compliance and safety.
